ygData.subject: Re: i need help
ygData.msgSnippet: I pay for the game with an atm card. They accepted it when I started and have accepted it since. However, the recommendation of the prepaid card is a very good
ygData.messageBody:
I pay for the game with an atm card. They accepted it when I started
and have accepted it since. However, the recommendation of the
prepaid card is a very good one. I am sure that the gods of gaming
could see the value in such cards, insuring that the customers
without credit cards could still play the game.

Good luck in the game, but I wish you no luck in finding someone to
give you the information you want. That you might get from a friend
or family, but a stranger who gives that info out would at best soon
have a stripped character. Most of the in-game thefts are from unwise
sharing, not clever hacking.

Barto Proudfoot
--- In EverQuest@y..., "country_boy_21_41465"
<country_boy_21_41465@y...> wrote:
> I am in need of help. I used to play everquest all the time using
a
> friends username and password until he changed his password and
never
> told me what the new one was. I know i am about to ask a stupid
> question but is there any way that anyone would let me use their
> username and password. I would be very greatful and i would stay
off
> of the severs you use, and i would help you anyway that i could. I
> would get a username and password if i could but i dont have a
credit
> card. I'm sorry if i have bothered any of you fine gamers but i
just
> had to ask. and if you will let me use your username and password
> email me.
>
>
>
> Thank you for taking the time to read this.
